Class Term

  • java.lang.Object
    • Term
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FunctionTerm, Variable

    abstract class Term
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that represents a term

        Term(Sort sort)
        Creates a new term of sort sort

    • Method Detail

      • getSubstitution

        public abstract java.util.Map<Variable,Term> getSubstitution(Term term,
                                                             java.util.Map<Variable,Term> substitutions)
        Returns a substitution such that the substitution applied to this term yields term. If this is not possible it returns null
        Parameters:
        term - The term that should be obtained by applying the substitution
        substitutions - The substitutions that are already defined, can be modified by this function
        Returns:
        A substitution such that if the substitution is applied to this term it yields term, or null if such a substitution is not possible
        See Also:
        Variable

      • applySubstitution

        public abstract Term applySubstitution(java.util.Map<Variable,Term> substitution)

      • getAllSubTerms

        public abstract java.util.Set<Term> getAllSubTerms()
        Returns all subterms of this term, including the term itself
        Returns:
        a Set of terms that are subterms of this term (including this term)

      • substitute

        public abstract Term substitute(Term term,
                                Term substitute)
        Substitutes each occurrence of term in this term by the term substitute
        Parameters:
        term - The term to be substituted
        substitute - The term that replaces the old term
        Returns:
        A new Term with each occurrence of term replaced by substitute

      • getVariables

        public abstract java.util.Collection<Variable> getVariables()
        Returns all the variables that occur in this term
        Returns:
        A collection of variables that occur in this term
        See Also:
        Variable, Collection
